Package csb :: Package bio :: Package hmm :: Class HMMLayer
[frames] | no frames]

Class HMMLayer

source code

              object --+            
                       |            
    core.AbstractIndexer --+        
                           |        
core.BaseDictionaryContainer --+    
                               |    
        core.DictionaryContainer --+
                                   |
                                  HMMLayer

Provides a dictionary-like catalog of the available states at this layer. Lookup keys are members of the States enumeration, e.g.:

>>> profile.layers[i][States.Deletion]
the deletion state at layer number i
Instance Methods

source code 

x.__init__(...) initializes x; see help(type(x)) for signature

Parameters:
  • rank (int) - layer's number
  • residue (ProteinResidue) - a representative ProteinResidue that is associated with this layer
  • states (dict) - initialization dictionary of States.Item:State pairs

append(self, state)

source code 

Append a new state to the catalog.

Parameters:
  • state (State) - the new state
Raises:
  • StateExistsError - when a state of the same type is already defined

update(self, state_kind, state)

source code 

Update the sate of the specified kind under the current layer.

Parameters:
  • state_kind (csb.core.EnumItem) - state type (key) - a member of States
  • state (State) - the new state info
Raises:
  • ValueError - if state.type differs from state_kind
